channel.title: Crowns
channel.description: I can't find my crowns for my client. I've looked everywhere in my cache and I didn't find it. It's a custom crown and I searched for cr0 and cr1 and all that. Didn't find anything.

item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @montrealboi montrealboi
item.description:
@montrealboi wrote:

Their Located in either the Cache or Sprites Folder located in the Client section

If not found their simply type in " Modicons " If that does not work then i have no idea what will

Read full topic

item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

fuk me get toms cache suit and then search…

Read full topic

item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:6, topic:402559”][quote author=HonorScape link=topic=499617.msg3653831#msg3653831 date=1309898494]
I can’t find my crowns for my client.
[/quote]
This was the original post.

There’s no @cr1@ in my client.java server sided. But I do client sided. I don’t like the crowns that’s there. I can’t find where they are. I want the normal crowns and I can’t find the current crowns where I need to replace them.

I’ve told you twice where they are; and of course they (the images) will not be in your server src. All that is sent is an integer to the client at login indicating the client’s right on the server (0 is normal player, 1 is player moderator, 2 is employee). The actual crown images themselves are located within the cache - or since you’ve mentioned they’re different than the defaults, they could be loaded from an image file (some.jpg) (which is a horrible fucking way of doing it, but a common practice around these parts).[/quote]
I want to change the image of the crown. I’ve looked everywhere in the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

HonorScape:

I can’t find my crowns for my client.

This was the original post.

HonorScape:

There’s no @cr1@ in my client.java server sided. But I do client sided. I don’t like the crowns that’s there. I can’t find where they are. I want the normal crowns and I can’t find the current crowns where I need to replace them.

I’ve told you twice where they are; and of course they (the images) will not be in your server src. All that is sent is an integer to the client at login indicating the client’s right on the server (0 is normal player, 1 is player moderator, 2 is employee). The actual crown images themselves are located within the cache - or since you’ve mentioned they’re different than the defaults, they could be loaded from an image file (some.jpg) (which is a horrible fucking way of doing it, but a common practice around these parts).

Read full topic

item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:4, topic:402559”][quote author=HonorScape link=topic=499617.msg3653848#msg3653848 date=1309899356]

client.drawChatArea() : @cr1@ and @cr2@

Huh…? I have no cr1 or cr2 pictures. Plus, I don’t know what that’s for. Sorry. I’m pretty new to coding.
[/quote]

Class: client
Method (assuming your client follows the name naming conventions as mitb’s 317 release): drawChatArea()
Line: search for @cr1@[/quote]

There’s no @cr1@ in my client.java server sided. But I do client sided. I don’t like the crowns that’s there. I can’t find where they are. I want the normal crowns and I can’t find the current crowns where I need to replace them.

Read full topic

item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“HonorScape, post:3, topic:402559”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=499617.msg3653845#msg3653845 date=1309899082]
client.drawChatArea() : @cr1@ and @cr2@
[/quote]

Huh…? I have no cr1 or cr2 pictures. Plus, I don’t know what that’s for. Sorry. I’m pretty new to coding.[/quote]

Class: client
Method (assuming your client follows the name naming conventions as mitb’s 317 release): drawChatArea()
Line: search for @cr1@

Read full topic
